en.title: FE Welcomes Thai VIP QP Wearer, Veerayuth Didyasarin!
en.content:
FE is proud to welcome Thai VIP QP Wearer, Veerayuth Didyasarin. Veerayuth is the son-in-law of the King of Thailand. He was married to the King's youngest daughter, Princess Julaporn. Veerayuth is a former test pilot and currently Chairman of the Board, National Air Sport Control and Chief of Vice President Executive Board, Royal Aeronautic Sports Association of Thailand, among other things. 

Veerayuth is seen here doing demonstrations with FE's Quantum Pendant and discussing FE's "Hope For Children" Charity with FE's Founder CEO Paul Ting and FE Thai Country Licensee Don Chan and showing the Association's impressive collection of super bikes (many are limited edition Harleys and one custom built bike with a 2000 CC engine!) and old aircrafts (one of the world's finest collection, around 100 aircrafts in all, most in flying condition, with one that is 82 years old!).

Veerayuth was very impressed by the power of FE's Scalar Energy Quantum Pendant! He was also very impressed by FE's culture of social entrepreneurship and keen to participate in FE's "Hope for Children" Charity project. FE is indeed much honored to work with someone of Veerayuth's background to help the poor and the needy.

Veerayuth is a former test pilot and currently Chairman of the Board, National Airsport Control and Chief of Vice President Executive Board, Royal Aeronautic Sports Association of Thailand, among other things.
